string.text: Mira PSO-1M

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]todos los fusiles del Pacto de Varsovia 
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PSO (para Pritsel Snaipersky Optichesky, "Optical Sniper Sight" o "Vista Óptica de Francotirador") es una serie de miras ópticas fabricadas en la Unión Soviética y producidas por la Planta de fabricación de instrumentos de Novosibirsk (NPZ Optics State Plant). En uso común desde 1964 cuando se introdujo como mira telescópica estándar para el rifle de francotirador SVD. adaptado para rifles de asalto como AK-74 o AN-94. Reconocido por su durabilidad, versatilidad y diseño de retícula muy bien diseñado con una conveniente escala de alcance de rango.Este tipo particular tiene una tasa de aumento de 4.0x, por lo que es utilizable principalmente para el combate en alcance largo. Se adjunta a las armas por medio de una montura en cola de milano, que es estándar en los países del Pacto de Varsovia.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Aumento: %c[ui_gray_1]4.0 x 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Condición: %c[ui_gray_1]bueno 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[0,14 0,140,140]Patrón de retícula: %c[ui_gray_1]PSO-1
Mira 1P29 "Tulip"

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]todos rifles del Pacto de Varsovia
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]La mira USP-1 (índice 1P29) tiene una disposición óptica con un sistema de montaje de prismás. Los ángulos de visión se establecen mecánicamente girando el cuerpo de la mira en relación con el soporte de montaje del arma. No requiere baterías ya que está iluminado con tritio. La escala de rango en el borde del campo de visión proporciona un medio para encontrar visualmente el rango de hasta 1200 m de un objetivo de 1,5 m de altura.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Aumento: %c[ui_gray_1]4,0x 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Condición: %c[ui_gray_1]bueno 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Patrón de retículo: %c[ui_gray_1]PSU-1
Mira Barska ELECTRO SIGHT AC10632

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]todos los rifles NATO (OTAN)
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Se desarrolló el visor de puntos rojos Barska Electro Sight Multi Reticle AC10632 para ser el mejor producto para cualquiera que busque una vista de alta calidad. Puede montarse en armas de la OTAN y en el AK-12.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Ampliación: %c[ui_gray_1]ninguno (colimador) 
 %c[0,93, 0,116] • %c[ui_gray_2]Estado: %c[ui_gray_1]muy bueno
Mira ACOG 3,5x

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]todos los rifles NATO (OTAN)
 
%c[ui_gray_1]ACOG son las siglas de Advanced Combat Optical Gunsights y se refiere a una familia de visores de armas de fuego producidos por la compañía Trijicon. Las miras de este tipo suelen ser de alta calidad y tienen una iluminación retícula interna a base de tritio. Este tipo particular tiene una retícula de estilo USMC y un aumento ajustable.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Ampliación: %c[ui_gray_1]3.5x 
 %c[0, 93,0,116] • %c[ui_gray_2]Condición: %c[ui_gray_1]muy buena 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Patrón de retícula: %c[ui_gray_1]USMC
Mira EOTech

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]todos los rifles NATO (OTAN)
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Mira holográfica para rifles de asalto y ametralladoras de la OTAN.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Aumento: %c[ui_gray_1]ninguno (colimador) 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Condición: %c[ui_gray_1]muy bueno
Mira Galil 4.0x (SUSAT)
Mira Galil 4.0x

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]rifle automático Galil AR 
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Visor óptico para el rifle israelí IMI Galil.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Ampliación: %c[ui_gray_1]4.0x 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Estado: %c[ui_gray_1]bueno 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Patrón de retícula: %c[ui_gray_1]SUSAT
EKP 1S-03 "Kobra"

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]todas los rifles del Pacto de Varsovia
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]La mira Kobra es una óptica de combate de colimador abierto que utiliza un HUD generado por láser para superponer un patrón de retícula en una lente filtrada. Está diseñado para acoplarse rápida metas y objetivos que aparecen durante un corto período de tiempo en lugares cerrados y combate urbano en diferentes condiciones de luz en movimiento. It provides despejado targeting from 104 lx to 10-2 lx (daylight, twilight and luz de la luna), one or two eye targeting. Efectiva al disparar desde vehículos en movimiento.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Ampliación: %c[ui_gray_1]Ninguno (colimador) 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Condición: %c[ui_gray_1]muy bueno
Mira PO4x34

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Serie de armas OTs-14
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Vista óptica para la serie de armas OTs-14.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Ampliación: %c[ui_gray_1]4.0x
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Estado: %c[ui_gray_1]bueno
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Patrón de retícula: %c[ui_gray_1]4x34
Mira PSO-1M2-1

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]todas Pacto de Varsovia rifles 
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]El PSO-1M2-O1 cuenta con una muy eficaz y útil telémetro basado en la altura para uso doble, con escalas graduadas para la estimación de la figura de pie y prono. El gradiente basado 400 metros de altura Simonov (estilo estrangulador) telémetro tiene un chevron para su uso con los rifles 9x39 calibre 
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Ampliación: %c[ui_gray_1]4.0 x 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Estado: %c[ui_gray_1]muy buena 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]patrón de retícula: %c[ui_gray_1]PSO-1-1
Mira PU

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]rifles rusos históricos
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Vista telescópica estándar del Ejército Rojo en la Guerra Mundial II y años después, diseñado para caber rifles de infantería y de precisión como Mosin-Nagant o SVT-40. Cuenta con un zoom fijo de 3.5x por lo que es una buena opción para el combate a larga distancia. Como todos los diseños soviéticos, es duradero y eficaz, permaneciendo en producción y uso hasta el día de hoy.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Ampliación: %c[ui_gray_1]3.5x 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Condición: %c[ui_gray_1]media 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Patrón de retícula: %c[ui_gray_1]PU
Mira ZF-4

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]rifles alemanes históricos 
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]ZF-4 es uno de los primeros telescopios jamás creados. Diseñado y fabricado en Alemania durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial, su objetivo era proporcionar a la infantería regular la capacidad de luchar a grandes distancias. Al final, debido a que no se han producido suficientes números, ha sido utilizado principalmente por francotiradores alemanes y escuadrones de combate de élite. La mira todavía está en uso, ya que las armas para las que ha sido diseñado están comúnmente disponibles, por lo que también sigue siendo un modelo relativamente popular en la Zona.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Aumento: %c[ui_gray_1]2.0x
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Estado: %c[ui_gray_1]bueno
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Patrón de retícula: %c[ui_gray_1]ZF-41
Mira Táctica C-MORE

Una mira de punto rojo de alto rendimiento que proporciona un campo de visión ilimitado, a la vez que elimina la obstrucción y la visión de túnel común a los visores de estilo tubular. La serie "Railway" tiene una base de riel estándar preinstalada para permitir que la mira se fije en la mayoría de los soportes o receptores de rieles Weaver o Picatinny.

 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Aumento: %c[ui_gray_1]ninguno (collimator)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condición: %c[ui_gray_1]bueno
Mira AC11090 Red Dot
Una mira de punto rojo barata con 2 aumentos para rifles de asalto de la OTAN, subfusiles y AK-12.
.45 Silenciador de ACP

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2].45 armas de calibre
 
%c[ui_gray_1]Silenciador para las pistolas .45 ACP y ametralladoras.

Silenciador 5,7x28

Silenciador 6P9

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:

%c[ui_gray_1]Silenciador para la pistola PB.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Supresión de sonido: %c[ui_gray_1]muy bueno
Silenciador 9A-91/VSK-94

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Armas de calibre 9x39 
 
%c[ui_gray_1]Silenciador para la carabina 9A-91 y VSK-94.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Supresión de sonido: %c[ui_gray_1]muy alto
Silenciador de 9mm

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Armas de calibre 9 mm
 
%c[ui_gray_1]Silenciador para pistolas y subametralladoras. Un Silenciador de sonido efectivo para armas de calibre 9x18. Es muy arcaico y, sin embargo, bastante efectivo. Su cuerpo contiene un rollo apretado de malla de latón fino. La parte frontal de la unidad está compuesta por un conjunto de toallitas de hule con orificios del tamaño de un calibre para que la bala atraviese. Normalmente se usa para enfrentamientos cuerpo a cuerpo contra enemigos con armadura ligera y para asesinatos.
 
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Supresión de sonido: %c[ui_gray_1]muy alto
Silenciador de APS

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]armas de calibre 9 mm
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Silenciador para la pistola OTs-33 "Pernach".
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Supresión de sonido: %c[ui_gray_1]medio
Silenciador ATG

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:

 %c[ui_gray_1]Silenciador para la AK-102, AK-103 and AK-104.

Silenciador Gemtech

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:

Silenciador KZRZP

 %c[ui_gray_1]Silenciador para el rifle de francotirador SVD.

 %c[ui_gray_1]Silenciador para disparar sin ruido y sin llama con Kalashnikov 7,62 mm.

Silenciador PBS-4

 %c[ui_gray_1]Silenciador para el rifle AKS-74U rifle.

Silenciador SR-25

 %c[ui_gray_1]Silenciador para el SR-25.

Silenciador TGP-A

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] armas de calibre 5.45 
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Silenciador para la serie de rifles AK y ametralladoras RPK-74.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Supresión de sonido: %c[ui_gray_1]medio
Silenciador SR-3M

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Armas de calibre 9x39 
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Silenciador para la el rifle SR-3M.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Supresión de sonido: %c[ui_gray_1]muy alto
Silenciador de rifle de pequeño calibre del ejército de EE.

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] armas de calibre 5.56x45 
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Silenciador de rifle avanzado para diseño y fabricación estadounidense, que tiene aparentemente "desapareció" de uno de los contenedores de suministros del ejército de la armada de los EEUU. UU. Consiste en un cuerpo de acero de alto grado lleno de cuatro cámaras de extensión, seguido de una serie de deflectores de titanio tipo Z. La unidad reduce casi por completo el fogonazo y reprime considerablemente el sonido emitido al disparar. También requiere un mantenimiento mínimo. Los Silenciadores de este tipo y similares se usan comúnmente en todos los rifles fabricados en el oeste de pequeño calibre y permanecen en servicio activo en las fuerzas armadas occidentales.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Supresión de sonido: %c[ui_gray_1]medio
Silenciador de SVU

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]rifles SVU
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Este Silenciador de tres cámaras especialmente diseñado no está destinado a silenciar por completo el rifle SVU ya que el soldado no usaría munición subsónica. Su objetivo principal es silenciar y difundir el ruido lo suficiente para dificultar la detección por parte del enemigo. Su característica especial es un corte de boca muy eficaz colocado en el extremo del Silenciador, capaz de reducir el retroceso en aproximadamente un 40%. Las capacidades superiores tienen el costo de reducir la velocidad del cañón y, por lo tanto, reducen significativamente la producción de daños del arma.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Supresión del sonido: %c[ui_gray_1]bajo 
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]ESPECIAL:
 
%c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]reducción de retroceso mejorado
Mira ACOG

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILIDAD:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]rifles seleccionados OTAN (OTAN)
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Alcance óptico desmontable hecho específicamente para rifles NATO (OTAN. ACOG significa Defensas Opticas de Combate Avanzadas y se refiere a una familia de armas de fuego producida por la empresa Trijicon. Las miras de este tipo suelen ser de alta calidad y tienen una iluminación retícula interna a base de tritio. Este tipo particular tiene una retícula de un moderno 'trijicon' y un aumento fijo de 2.0x.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Ampliación: %c[ui_gray_1]2,0x 
 %c[0, 93,0,116] • %c[ui_gray_2]Condición: %c[ui_gray_1]muy buena 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Patrón de retícula: %c[ui_gray_1]trijicon
OKP-7 Scope (dovetail mount)

The original design can be used under any conditions, and also, if necessary, allows the use of a standard mechanical device. The main feature of the sight is the mount of the reflector without a mechanical frame, covering an appreciable part of the firing sector. Reflector protection in extreme conditions is provided by a thin and durable metal visor, which practically does not interfere with firing.
Trijicon RMR Red Dot Sight

Trijicon RMR (RMR) is a compact reflex sight. The RM07C is an LED sight powered by a standard CR2032 battery. Housed in rugged forged aluminum, it's extremely tough yet lightweight. The easy-to-use adjusters with audible clicks allow for quick windage and elevation adjustments. Featuring eight available brightness settings, the reticle can be manually adjusted by pressing the plus or minus buttons on either side of the unit. To switch to auto adjust mode, simply press both buttons simultaneously and release.
Aimpoint Red Dot Sight (high spacer)

• Unlimited field of view • Parallax-free • Unlimited eye relief • Unaffected by extreme weather conditions • Extremely rugged, durable construction • No hazardous materials • No laser emission that could be harmful to your eyes • Increased aiming confidence and hit probability • Reduced training time and ammunition consumption • Battery life measured in years.
Cobra EKP 8-02 Red Dot Sight

The Cobra sight provides confident aiming in natural light conditions (bright sunny day, deep twilight and moonlit night) due to the presence of 16 levels of manual brightness adjustment of the aiming mark. The location of the aiming mark and target in the same plane allows for aiming with both one and two eyes, which creates an unlimited field of view for the shooter, and conduct effective high-speed shooting at quickly moving, small and suddenly appearing for a short time targets.
ELCAN SpecterDR Sight

The SpecterDR 4x/1x Dual Role Optical Sight represents a revolution in optical sight design. The world’s first truly dual field of view combat optical sight, the SpecterDR switches instantly from a 4x magnified sight to a 1x CQB sight with the throw of a lever. Unlike zoom sights, the SpecterDR offers an optimized optical path and identical eye relief in both 4x and 1x modes. Depending upon the situation, the user may adjust the sight to illuminate the crosshair or just a brilliant red dot in the center. In 1x mode, the SpecterDR has by far the largest field of view in the industry. In 4x mode the SpecterDR offers a generous field of view, long eye relief, and ELCAN’S legendary crystal clear image. The SpecterDR 4x/1x offers the best single solution for both Medium Range and CQB engagements and is designed to withstand the rigors of modern professional use. (The scope has back up iron sights on top of it).
PSO-1Ì (no eyecup)

Military grade sniper optical scope PSO 1M2-1, manufactured by Zenit-Belomo. This optical scope is designed for precision sight fire with Special Sniper Rifle (VSS) and Dragunov Sniper Rifle (SVD) on the variety of targets with 4x magnification and 6 degree FOV.
OKP-7 (For Picatinny/weaver)

The original design of OKP sights allows firing from unstable positions in rapidly changing conditions, reduces the operator fatigue, and, if necessary, allows unhindered use of base mechanical sights. The key feature of this sight is a rimless reflector attachment that doesn't block any field of fire sections; instead, reflector is protected by thin and durable visor that is almost un-noticeable when firing. This variant is installed on the dovetail type mount.
Docter Sight III

Docter as a brand was born in 1991, but the company started writing its story much earlier. It was previously called Carl Zeiss Jena. In the 1980s, this was one of the largest optics manufacturing companies in the world. They started operating more than 100 years ago and built an impeccable reputation throughout the years. After World War II, the company started growing rapidly and bloomed until East and West Germany merged in 1991. This was when the first major change happened – the company was taken over by Bernhard Docter. Shockingly, the company bankrupted. Analytic Jena Group bought Docter in 1997, and the company started growing again. In 2018, a change in administration occurred. The company was renamed from Docter to Noblex. Most of the products remained in the offer but Noblex added some new ones as well. They retained the famous logo – the owl. Throughout the years, Docter has been known to offer high-quality Made-in-Germany products for an affordable price. Because of that, the company gathered plenty of followers, loyal to the brand. Since 2018, when Noblex took over, the company expanded their manufacturing processes elsewhere.
1P59 "Giperon" pancratic sniper sight

The Giperon pancratic sniper sights are designed for target reconnaissance and aimed fire from sniper rifles, and providing for automatic input of the sighting angle during target ranging. Compared to the organic PSO-1 sight, the 1P59 Giperon pancratic sight improves the effectiveness of SVD fire 1.3-2 times (depending on the target range and size) through a greater magnification, a more accurate rangefinder, combining target ranging and sighting angle input operations, as well as the sighting angle input scale incorporated within the field of view of the sight.
1PN93-4 Night Sight
The 1PN93 SVD night sights are designed for target detection and recognition and aimed fire at point-blank range under natural night illumination conditions. 1PN93-4 is Gen. 3 of night optic.
PKS-07

PKS-07 Tactical Sniper Sight w/ Dual Black/Red Rangefinding Reticle, Universal AK/SKS/SVD Version is a unique sniper scope based on collimator technology. The scope was created in LOMO (Saint-Petersburg, Russia) especially for the VSK-94 sniper platform. As it was technologically more advanced as well as lighter, the Russian military has chosen it over the PSO-3 as the standard optic for the SV-98. We offer an AA version with linearly marked elevation turrets, exclusively imported by Kalinka Optics It fits AK and SVD rifles and is optimized for use on SVD, Tigr, PSL Mosin and similar rifles. It's fully coated prismatic lens system provides a remarkable, high contrast, wide angle field of view and lower eyepiece location for comfortable aiming. The scope has an illuminated rangefinding reticle. The scope has POSP-style windage and elevation adjustments (every elevation turret' click moves POI by 4.5 cm at 100 m, every windage turret' click moves POI by 2.5 cm at 100 m). The special protective lens coatings protect the scope from scratching and fouling in the extreme battlefield conditions where it was designed to operate. Notice the extreme temperature rating on this scope, you'll quit before it will. It comes with a cover case and rubber eyepiece. A definite BEST CHOICE!.
Leupold Mark 8 CQBSS 1.1-8x24

From close quarters to long range target engagements, the Leupold Mark 8 CQBSS 1.1-8x24mm incorporates everything Military, Law Enforcement and Competition shooters need into one extremely versatile riflescope. The illuminated front focal plane reticles provide accurate range estimation throughout the entire zoom range. Eight brightness settings ensure optimal visibility of the illuminated reticle in all lighting conditions and are compatible with night vision devices. An off position between each numbered brightness setting ensures long battery life and nearly instant return to the desired reticle intensity.
Meprolight M21

Meprolight Mepro M21 is a battle-proven red dot sight, tested in the harshest conditions imaginable. It doesn’t work on a battery but is powered by a fibre optic collector system during the day and by tritium at night – when all other sights fail, M21 will continue to work. With a QD-detachable mount, you will be able to mount and dismount this sight from the Picatinny platform in a matter of seconds. it can be paired with night vision goggles and scopes which greatly increases its usability. Meprolight is an Israeli company, founded in 1990. They offer includes day optical devices, night vision devices, thermal imaging devices, self-illuminated night sights, etc. Their products have been tested to withstand the harshest conditions imaginable, which is why they are popular with the military and law enforcement. The company complies with NATO and US military specifications as well as International MIL Standards.
Aimpoint Micro T1 (low spacer)

No matter what your mission, the size and weight of your equipment is a critical factor. With the Aimpoint® Micro T-1, Aimpoint has introduced an aiming system that provides the performance of our full-sized sights in a small package. Since its introduction in 2007, the Aimpoint® Micro T-1 has become very popular worldwide due to its size, light weight and robust build quality.
Aimpoint PRO

Aimpoint Patrol Rifle Optic is designed with input from a distinguished group of current and former professionals. The Patrol Rifle Optic incorporates many never before seen features to maximize this sight's performance within the challenging conditions faced by modern law enforcement. The Aimpoint® PRO sight comes in a ready-to-go kit at a budget friendly price, a concept that appeals strongly to Law Enforcement units.
1P76 "Rakurs-À" (for Dovetail mount)

The 1P76 optical sight designed for battlefield surveillance, target selection, target ranging and aimed fire against luminous and illuminated targets during the day, at dusk and at night. The sights have a wide field of view that allows for quick terrain observation in a fast-moving combat situation simultaneously with the naked eye and through the sight without loss of target visibility.
PK-A Red Dot Sight

Another long time favorite, the PK-A is a sturdy and robust red dot tube optic. Originally appearing to be an adaptation of the original PSO SVD optic, the PK-A has a similar construction and the same style of hammer grey finish
Kobra EKP 8-18 Red Dot Sight

Kobra Military 8-18 Red Dot Weaver Rifle Scope, Screw Mount. The world famous Kobra is an open collimator "red dot" combat optic using laser-generated "heads-up display" (HUD) technology to superimpose a reticle pattern onto a filtered lens which acts as an aiming device for the shooter. This system presents an unobstructed field of view, in 1x power which allows for extremely comfortable, "both eyes open" shooting. On average, most users will see a 1.5 times faster target acquisition and a 50% smaller shot group at 100 meters, in comparison to the iron sights. It is designed for engaging fast moving targets and targets appearing for a short period of time in close quarters and urban combat situations in various light conditions. It provides clear targeting from 104 lx to 10-2 lx (daylight, twilight and moonlight), one- or two-eye targeting, is very effective when shooting from moving vehicles, and allows for perfect kill shots on fast-moving, small and spontaneously appearing targets.

Salvo 12 sound suppressor

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 12 calibre
 
%c[ui_gray_1]Salvo 12 silencer for 12" shotguns made by SilencerCo. Designed to operate with most pump action and semi automatic shotguns and almost all commercially available ammunition, at its full length of 12" the Salvo 12 brings sound down to 136.8 dB at the muzzle with #7 shot. Configurations of 6", 8", 10", and 12" allow the end user to customize the Salvo 12 for sporting clay, waterfowl, turkey hunting, home defense, and many other applications and accept the appropriate tradeoff of size for sound reduction. 
 
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Sound suppression: %c[ui_gray_1]high
Deltapoint PRO Red Dot Sight

The DeltaPoint Pro is proof that you don’t have to compromise performance, even on a small sight. Its incredibly wide field-of-view and crystal-clear glass dominates the competition, while its rugged aluminum housing and steel sheath ensure it will perform in the harshest conditions. Ease-of-use was also a focus when designing this elite red dot sight, which is why we put an easy access battery compartment on top and gave it click-adjustments for more precision. And this isn’t just a pistol sight either; the DP Pro is just as at home on AR’s, shotguns, and pretty much anything else that goes bang.
EOTech XPS3-0 Sight

The XPS3 is smaller and lighter than all other holographic weapon sights but just as fast. Law enforcement officers and hunters appreciate the light weight and compact size for carrying convenience on the job and in the woods. The XPS3 runs on a single 123 battery. The single-lithium-battery configuration allows more rail space, leaving more room for rear-iron sights, magnifiers, or a night vision mount.
PN-23 Night Sight

The PN23 is a dedicated night vision sight. It features a compact size teamed with a useful 3x magnification range. This provides an impressive 400 meter recognition range with a very wide field of view at 12°. The illuminated reticle is designed to provide both speed and precision.
EOTS-62

The Electroptical Targeting System EOTS-62, was developed by in secret laboratories inside the Zone for use with ultra-precise weapon known as “Type 62”. It can be mounted on a “Picatinny rail” type mount. Has a target detection function.

%c[ui_gray_1]SKS shot sound suppressor from the Hexagon company.

March Tactical 3-24x42 FFP

March Tactical 3-24x42 First Focal Plane scope, reliable and accurate with ammunition of any power. Made by japanese DEON Optical Design Corporation company. The March-F 3-24x42 Tactical Riflescope is the go to scope for both long range hunters and tactical shooters all over the world. The scope has a 42mm objective lens made of extra low dispersion optical glass that allows for a bright and clear sight picture in most light conditions. The scope features tactical exposed turrets for windage and elevation, parallax correction from 10 yards to infinity, and an Illuminated tactical reticle in the first focal plane.
PGO-7V Sight
The PGO-7 optical sight is the main sight of the RPG-7 hand grenade launcher. It serves to aim a grenade launcher when firing at targets located at different ranges.
1P76 "Rakurs-À" (for picatinny/weaver)

The 1P76 optical sight designed for battlefield surveillance, target selection, target ranging and aimed fire against luminous and illuminated targets during the day, at dusk and at night. The sights have a wide field of view that allows for quick terrain observation in a fast-moving combat situation simultaneously with the naked eye and through the sight without loss of target visibility.
Aimpoint CompM4s (for picatinny/weaver)

The Aimpoint® CompM4s sight, with low battery compartment, belongs to the CompM4 series of sights which are the finest sights Aimpoint has ever produced. Improvements include advanced energy efficiency that provides up to 8 years of continuous use from a single AA battery!
SUSAT

SUSAT is 4X optical sight, developed in the UK at the Royal Arms Research and Development Center. Manufactured by Avimo as well as United Scientific Instruments. It is most often used for aimed fire from light small arms at medium and long distances. It is mounted on a special mount for the L85 “Dovetail”, the kit also includes an adapter bracket for mounting the sight on a mount such as “picatinny/weaver”. (The scope has back up iron sights on top of it).
1P78 Kashtan

1P78 is one of the newest optics to enter into service with the Russian armed forces. The design is similar in concept to the ACOG with a relatively low magnification (2.8x) and ability to point and shoot without having to adjust any controls.
1PN93-1 Night Sight

The generation 2 night sight with fixed magnification (4 diopters). Option 1PN93-1 is designed for combat in conditions of poor visibility at medium distances. Designed for mounting on weapons with standard dovetail mount (like Warsaw Treaty countries)
Firefield Kemper XL-M Reflex Sight

The Kemper XL-M is a panoramic open red dot sight, ideal for high-speed shooting, offhand shooting and shooting at moving targets. Unlike the civilian model, the "M" -armic variant of the sight is made of a more durable aluminum alloy - i.e. Specially designed for harsh environments. Installed on Weaver/Picatinny rails.
1P29 "Tulpan" (No Eyecup)

%c[ui_gray_1]The USP-1 sight (index 1P29) has an optical arrangement with a prism-erecting system. Sighting angles are set mechanically by turning the sight body relative to the weapon mounting bracket. Requires no batteries as it is tritium illuminated. The ranging scale at the edge of the sight's field of view provides a means to find visually the range of up to 1200 m of a target 1.5 m high.

Trijicon Tactical Kit. (for picatinny/weaver)

This tactical kit includes combination of two scopes made by Trijicon US company. The kit gives ability to install two scopes Trijicon Acog BAC 5.56 BDC and Trijicon RMR on rifles that have picatinny or weaver mounts. This setup allows shooter to use his rifle on short and long distances without any discomfort.
Leupold RMR Tactical Kit. (for picatinny/weaver)

This tactical kit includes combination of two scopes made by Leupold and Trijicon US companies. The kit gives ability to install two scopes Leupold Mark 8 CQBSS and Trijicon RMR on rifles that have picatinny or weaver mounts. This setup allows shooter to use his rifle on short and long distances without any discomfort.

%c[ui_gray_1] A rare and not very popular body kit for the AK-105 due to its price. It is found mainly among veterans of the Clear Sky group. The set includes: an extended fore-end, an ergonomic stock and a more comfortable pistol grip. In addition, the kit includes an improved trigger and three sighting devices that turn the weapon into an "ideal companion" at close and medium-long distances. Scopes (included): Elcan SpecterDR, Trijicon RMR calimator sight mounted at 45 degrees and AN/PEQ-15 LAM. The kit also includes a set of 45 rounds mags. This upgrade is irreversible.
